description: Following the installation of security updates KB5037771, KB5037770, and KB5037768 on various Windows 10 and 11 versions, users may experience an unintended disclosure of information due to a vulnerability in the Windows Cloud Files Mini Filter Driver. Specifically, kernels' sensitive memory contents may be revealed, potentially exposing critical system information to unauthorized access. This behavior can lead to administrative confusion and concerns regarding system integrity, especially on build numbers 10.0.19045.4412, 10.0.22631.3593, and others listed in the update. Users are advised to be vigilant about their data and monitor for unusual information access patterns as they evaluate the security implications of this update.
